[ Control | The ECLiPSe Built-In Predicates | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

false

Does not succeed (synonym of fail/0).

Description

Does not succeed.

Fail Conditions

Always fails.

Resatisfiable

No.

Examples

Success:
      [eclipse]: [user].
       not1(Goal) :- call(Goal), !, false.
       not1(_).
       user compiled 208 bytes in 0.02 seconds
      [eclipse]: not1(true).
      no.
      [eclipse]: not1(fail).
      yes.
      [eclipse]: not1(false).
      yes.

Fail:
      false.

See Also

fail / 0
